item.title: 'Ghachar Ghochar' By Vivek Shanbhag - Book Notes
item.description: A look into the lives of an Indian household with all its perjudices and beautiful memories. Captures someone who simply sits there for so long must have a thousand wheels spinning in his head. ‘Sir – one story, many sides.’ Words after all are nothing by themselves. They burst into meaning only in the minds they’ve entered. At times, I’m tempted to unburden myself to him. But then, what’s the point when he seems to know without being told?
